title: Morning Duties (Request) [Fan-Art]
body: A little bit last year year, someone (whose name keeps changing far too much) request that I did some fan-art for them, so I thought I'd share how I am coming along with it. Looking for an insightful comments that could help me tweak it up a little before I spend the next 6-8 hours shading it.

replies.body: I'm not sure if I want to know what is happening in that picture...
Lux helping Riven do her hair?
That's not what i see but ok.

do you mind telling me, cause that what it was _meant_ to be

obviously, it's not clear enough :/

Someone with a really skimpy shirt and a weird as hell looking tongue creeping on another girl is probably the politest way i can put it.

Rule 34 essentially.
